entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 20.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
